website_summaries.verdict: You definitely don't need Simplehuman's pricey Wide-View Sensor Mirror to get ready in the morning, but makeup and tech enthusiasts alike will likely enjoy this quirky smart home product.
pros: The LEDs in the $400 Simplehuman Wide-View Sensor Mirror adjust to mimic the lighting from any location
It looks nice, too, and did a good job approximating a variety of different white-light color temperatures
cons: Not many people need (or want) to customize their makeup based on the lighting in one room
The mirror only magnifies one time, it doesn't feel particularly durable and the auto-sensing LEDs occasionally shut off when we were using the mirror

product_meta.title: simplehuman Sensor Mirror Pro Wide View, Lighted Vanity Mirror, 1x Magnification, Adjustable Color Temperature, Wifi-Enabled
product_meta.description:
See yourself in the best light! The simplehuman wide-view sensor mirror has a wide viewing area with side panels that fold in so you can see yourself from many angles. It automatically lights up as your face approaches. Its tru-lux light system simulates natural sunlight, allowing you to see full color variation, so you'll always know when your makeup is color-correct and flawless. The mirror easily recharges with the included USB cord and adapter, and one charge lasts up to 3 weeks. Download the simplehuman app to capture and recreate customized light settings from the gym, your office, favorite restaurant or anywhere you want to look your best.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: Tru-lux light system closely simulates natural sunlight - twice as bright and more color-correct than the next best
Use the app to capture light settings from the world around you and accurately recreate them in the mirror
Sensor on/off - automatically lights up as your face approaches
Cordless and rechargeable -- one charge lasts up to 3 weeks
Our new sensor mirror has a wide viewing area and folding side panels that give you a great view at any angle - no magnification needed!
5 year manufacturer warranty valid only with purchased from authorized sellers including simplehuman or Amazon.com
